The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Essence impling
This article is about the creature. For the captured version, see Essence impling jar.
Essence impling
Released11 June 2007 (Update)
MembersYes
RaceImpling
LocationMost likely Puro-Puro, but can be almost anywhere.
OptionsCatch
ExamineAn impling who likes Magic. Magic!
Map
5 locationsShow exact locations
Advanced data
NPC ID1639,1649

The Essence impling is an impling that can be caught in the Impetuous Impulses minigame, and are located throughout Puro-Puro and Gielinor. It requires at least 42 Hunter to catch. It can also be caught barehanded at level 52 Hunter.

Despite its low Hunter level requirement, it can still be a very worthwhile impling to catch due to the large amount of valuable runes that it provides, such as Law runes, Blood runes, and Nature runes, as well as a variety of other useful runes.

Unlike its rarer counterparts, the Essence impling will always respawn within a minute of being caught in Puro Puro, so it can prove to be useful to find their exact spawn location within the maze.

Loot[edit | edit source]

At current Grand Exchange prices, opening an essence impling jar gives 1,271 worth of loot, on average. This means opening essence impling jars marks an average profit of −1,190 per jar, however this does not include loot from clue scrolls.

On average, one would profit −59,525 to get a medium clue scroll from essence impling jars at current Grand Exchange prices, excluding the rewards from the completed Treasure Trails.

The following drop rates are provided by Jagex, unless otherwise specified.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2016
(update | poll)
  • Implings can now be caught barehanded, without a net, and those outside Puro Puro do not require a jar.
  • Medium clue scrolls have been added to essence impling drop tables.
